This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsHi, these videos are from the same night in Erlanger, KY on June 6th 2009 They are both recorded in the exact location as the first report. File 1 is a better look at the original. File 1 uses manual focus. File 2 was recorded about 15 minutes before File 1, using auto focus. "I saw this on my home from a friends house. At first it looked like a really bright, giant star, but when you looked closely, you could see it changing colors like a strobe light. I got home and filmed it for about an hour, this is the best look at it." for further details see original report.
